headline.main: RED ARMY ROLLING; Storms Ukraine Citadel and Seizes Towns on Kiev Rail Line DONBAS KEYS TAKEN Nazis Retreat Toward Dnieper -- 550 Places Fall in Two Days Red Army Rolls On, Takes Sumy; Key Donets Basin Points Also Fall

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Friday, Sept. 3 -- Moscow announced early today that five Red armies plunging westward had cut the Bryansk-Kiev railway 150 miles from Kiev, smashed German reinforcements in a six-mile gain on Smolensk and rolled up Axis lines in a new forty-five-mile-wide spurt in the Donets Basin.
abstract: USSR forces take Sumy; salvo fired; Stalin-order-of-the-day text; USSR forces take Krolevets and Yampol on Bryansk-Kiev ry; take Lisichansk, Voroshilovsk, Slavyanoserbsk and other cities, Donets Basin; large-scale Ger retreat to Dnieper River indicated; USSR forces advance on Smolensk front; take Budennovka in Mariupol advance; map
